titles.title: A resolution commemorating the 50th anniversary of Cascade Head Preserve, an Oregon natural icon.
A resolution commemorating the 50th anniversary of Cascade Head Preserve, an Oregon natural icon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations
Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

bill.summary:
Commemorates the 50th anniversary of the Cascade Head Preserve in Oregon.
Applauds the outstanding commitment of the Preserve's stewards, naturalists, volunteers, and community leaders in:
protecting the ecological significance of the Preserve, and supporting the local economy through tourism and recreation.
